category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: LHN_Applications_List
preference.preference_description: Defines the applications displayed in the Left Hand Navigation (LHN) pane. The format of values for this preference is "perspectiveId:DisplayMode". For example, for setting the "My Teamcenter" perspective as primary and the "Getting Started" perspective as secondary, the preference values would be: com.teamcenter.rac.ui.perspectives.navigatorPerspective:primary com.teamcenter.rac.gettingstarted.GettingStartedPerspective:secondary If any conflict is found in the preference values then that value will be skipped. The preference does not have any value by default, which means that all applications are loaded as default in Teamcenter. If the value is "EMPTY", no application is displayed in the LHN. After modifying the preference, the rich client needs to be restarted. Preference values are only to be configured by a system administrator.
